mapper.select: WITH j AS (SELECT * FROM prj_particir WHERE manager = 'A1') SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_access, p.manager_accp, p.write_access, p.update_access, p.board_access, p.comment_access, p.file_access, p.dept_id, j.prj_particir_id AS manager_particir_id, j.member_id, (SELECT member_name FROM member WHERE member_id = j.member_id) AS manager_name FROM project p LEFT JOIN j ON (p.project_id = j.project_id) WHERE p.project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET project_name = #{projectName}, project_access = #{projectAccess}, manager_accp = #{managerAccp}, write_access = #{writeAccess}, update_access = #{updateAccess}, board_access = #{boardAccess}, comment_access = #{commentAccess}, file_access = #{fileAccess}, dept_id = #{deptId} WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.prj_board_id, p.prj_board_title, p.prj_board_subject, p.prj_board_regdate, p.member_id, p.insp_yn, p.pin_yn, p.board_type, p.project_id, p.coordinate, m.member_name, m.real_profile_path FROM prj_board p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE prj_board_id NOT IN (SELECT prj_board_id FROM prj_task WHERE high_task_id IS NOT NULL) AND project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY prj_board_regdate DESC

mapper.select: SELECT p.prj_particir_id, p.member_id, p.manager, p.project_id, p.alarm_yn, p.project_markup, p.particir_accp, m.member_name, m.real_profile_path FROM prj_particir p JOIN member m ON p.member_id=m.member_id WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND p.particir_accp = 'A1'
SELECT prj_particir_id, member_id, manager, project_id, alarm_yn, project_markup, particir_accp FROM prj_particir WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT p.member_id, m.member_name, m.real_profile_path FROM prj_particir p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND p.particir_accp = 'A2'

SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, find_subcode(p.project_access) AS project_access, find_subcode(p.manager_accp) AS manager_accp, find_subcode(p.write_access) AS write_access, find_subcode(p.update_access) AS update_access, find_subcode(p.board_access) AS board_access, find_subcode(p.file_access) AS file_access, find_subcode(p.comment_access) AS comment_access, pp1.prj_particir_num, find_subcode(pp2.project_markup) AS project_markup, find_subcode(pp2.particir_accp) AS particir_accp, p.dept_id, find_subcode(p.project_cls) AS project_cls FROM project p JOIN ( SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS prj_particir_num FROM prj_particir WHERE particir_accp='A1' GROUP BY project_id ) pp1 ON (p.project_id = pp1.project_id) JOIN( SELECT project_markup, project_id, member_id, particir_accp FROM prj_particir )pp2 ON(pp1.project_id=pp2.project_id) WHERE pp2.member_id=#{memberId} AND pp2.project_markup='A1' AND pp2.particir_accp='A1' AND p.project_cls='A2' ORDER BY p.project_id

SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, find_subcode(p.project_access) AS project_access, find_subcode(p.manager_accp) AS manager_accp, find_subcode(p.write_access) AS write_access, find_subcode(p.update_access) AS update_access, find_subcode(p.board_access) AS board_access, find_subcode(p.file_access) AS file_access, find_subcode(p.comment_access) AS comment_access, pp1.prj_particir_num, find_subcode(pp2.project_markup) AS project_markup, find_subcode(pp2.particir_accp) AS particir_accp, p.dept_id, find_subcode(p.project_cls) AS project_cls FROM project p JOIN ( SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS prj_particir_num FROM prj_particir WHERE particir_accp='A1' GROUP BY project_id ) pp1 ON (p.project_id = pp1.project_id) JOIN( SELECT project_markup, project_id, member_id, particir_accp FROM prj_particir )pp2 ON(pp1.project_id=pp2.project_id) WHERE pp2.member_id=#{id} AND pp2.project_markup='A2' AND pp2.particir_accp='A1' AND p.project_cls='A2' ORDER BY p.project_id
